# Mellisa Myres - Personal Website

## About
This is the personal website of Mellisa Myres, founder of Strawlo. The site shares business ideas, marketing frameworks, and insights to help you sell on the internet.

## Site Structure
- / - Homepage with bio, latest blog posts, and portfolio companies
- /blog - Blog listing with categories: Business, Marketing, AI, Stocks & Investments
- /blog/[slug] - Individual blog posts
- /about - About page with detailed bio

## Contact
- Email: mellisamyres901@gmail.com
- Twitter: https://x.com/mellisacodes
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mellisa-myres/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mellisaamimi/

## Companies
- Strawlo (https://strawlo.com) - Building innovative digital products
- Marketing Crafted - Coming soon

## Content Focus
- Business ideas and entrepreneurship
- Marketing frameworks and strategies
- AI and technology
- Stocks and investments
